name: Can't Cube It
description:
THE HARDEST GAME EVER

(RAGE GUARANTEED)

How It Works:

You're a cube and you just need to avoid the red blocks. You can move with "a" to the left or with "d" to the right, or use the left and right arrow keys.

(TIP: if you need double speed to go to the left or the right use "a" and the left arrow key or "d" and the right arrow key at the same time.

you can also jump: just with space bar. The game is still in development so if you have any more ideas for the game please leave them in the comments :)
